# Introduction

This is a simple R Markdown file created for module 12 of LIS 4370. In the following
sections there will an FAQ for my upcoming R package, as well as some sample code.

# FAQ
Q. What will your package be called?
A. robsentiment

Q. What will your package aim to do?
A. Provide text sentiment analysis quickly and easily

Q. What are some functions that you will include?
A. I will include a sentiment score function that will
quickly tell you the sentiment of text. It will return
a value that indicates the negativity/positivity.
I will also have a function that provides tokenization,
text preprocessing, etc.
